    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BuilderDAO
    DAO class for managing Builder data.
    BuilderMenuView
    Console menu view for users with the Builder role.
    Client
    Represents a client associated with a construction project.
    ClientTest
    Unit tests for Client.
    InputUtil
    Utility class for handling user input from the console.
    InvalidCredentialsException
    Exception thrown when user login fails due to invalid credentials, such as incorrect password or user ID.
    LoginView
    Handles user authentication through the console interface.
    Main
    Entry point of the Builder Portfolio Management application.
    MainMenuView
    Displays the main menu of the application.
    ManagerDAO
    DAO class for managing Project Manager data.
    ManagerMenuView
    Represents the menu interface for users with the Project Manager role.
    Project
    Represents a construction project in the Builder Portfolio Management System.
    ProjectDAO
    DAO class for managing Project data.
    ProjectService
    Service layer class that handles all project-related operations.
    ProjectStatusTest
    Unit tests for the Status enum.
    ProjectTest
    Unit tests for the Project class.
    ProjectView
    View layer class responsible for handling all project-related user interactions from the console.
    RegisterView
    View layer class responsible for handling new user registration.
    ServiceFactory
    Factory class that provides shared service instances for the application.
    Session
    Manages the current logged-in user session.
    Status
    Enum representing project progress state.
    User
    Represents a user in the Builder Portfolio Management System.
    UserAlreadyExistsException
    Exception thrown when an attempt is made to register a user with an email or ID that already exists in the system.
    UserDAO
    DAO class for managing User data.
    UserNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a requested user cannot be found in the system.
    UserService
    Service layer class responsible for handling all user-related business logic.
    UserTest
    Unit tests for the User class.
    ValidationUtil
    Utility class for validating user input fields such as email address, phone number, and password.
